dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and calculated risks to pursue opportunities.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability, avoiding high-risk investments.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new skills and knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn by doing, preferring hands-on experience over theoretical studies.
Your FarTwin will focus on abstract concepts and theoretical foundations, often neglecting practical applications.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use reason and evidence to arrive at solutions, valuing accuracy above all else.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on gut feelings to guide decision-making.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle social gatherings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in social settings, enjoying the company of others and often taking center stage.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter environments, recharging alone before engaging with others.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing, striving to accumulate wealth over short-term indulgences.
Your FarTwin will focus on enjoying life's luxuries, spending money on experiences and possessions that bring joy.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their schedule?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be adaptable and spontaneous, responding to changing circumstances rather than adhering to strict routines.
Your FarTwin will prioritize planning and organization, using schedules and to-do lists to stay on track.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly share their feelings, using verbal communication to convey emotions and needs.
Your FarTwin will manage their emotions internally, relying on body language and tone of voice to convey affect.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin showcase their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into visual arts, music, or other creative pursuits.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through writing, whether fiction, journalism, or another form of storytelling.
